SELECT T.ID, T.MEMBER_ID, T.ACTIVITY_ID, a.member_name, a.real_name, a.mobile FROM QKJVIP_MEMBER_ACTIVITYMBS T join qkjvip_member a on (t.MEMBER_ID=a.member_id) WHERE 1=1 --(a.statusflag = 0 OR a.statusflag = 2)
AND T.ACTIVITY_ID LIKE '%${params.activityId}%'
AND T.member_id LIKE '${params.memberId}'

SELECT member.real_name,member.member_name,member.mobile,a.*, case when ISNULL(b.id, '')='' then 0 else 1 end as bmstatus, case when ISNULL(m.id, '')='' then 0 else 1 end as qdstatus,b.id bmid
from qkjvip_member_activitymbs a left join qkjvip_member_signup b on (a.activity_id=b.acitvity_id and a.member_id=b.memberid) LEFT JOIN qkjvip_member_signupmember m on (m.activity_id=a.activity_id and m.member_id=a.member_id) join qkjvip_member member on (member.member_id=a.member_id) WHERE 1=1
AND a.ACTIVITY_ID LIKE '%${params.activityId}%'
AND a.member_id LIKE '${params.memberId}'
